title: Aaron Carter aims expletive-filled rant at Logan Paul after Nick row
text:
The pair aren’t too happy with each other to say the least (Picture: BACKGRID/Impaulsive/YouTube)

It seems Aaron Carter and Logan Paul’s friendship was a lot more short-lived than anyone expected, after the singer fumed at the YouTuber over Twitter in expletive-filled rants.

Some friendships are just not meant to be, eh?

Just days ago, the pair seemed like close pals after Aaron made Logan a custom sweater and appeared on his podcast Impaulsive.

However, things got personal when Logan accused Aaron of giving him a fake chain after he traded it for his own.

Pulling up a screenshot of a similar pendant on Amazon, which retails at around $15 (£13), Logan admitted he thought it was the same one.

Co-host Mike Majlak recalled that the pair took it to a ‘high-end Beverly Hills jeweller’, who said that the chain was fake but the diamond pendant was real.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The YouTube star went on to claim that Aaron’s pendant would be worth $6000-$7000 (£5400-£6300) while his original Impaulsive chain was worth $15,000 (£13,500).

However, Aaron, who recently apologised to his brother Nick after their feud, didn’t take the news lightly.

‘Ain’t nobody’s chain fake @LoganPaul so you can give that right back to me. You did not confirm it in anyway shape or form it’s 50 carrots [carrot emoji] of vvs vvs1 s1 and s2 diamonds. In white gold 18 K If you gotta issue and are gonna talk behind my back say it to my face again. B***H!!’ he wrote.

Aaron aimed an expletive-filled rant at Logan (Picture: Twitter/AaronCarter)

He added: ‘I already got suny making my own chain for me and a lot of people think you’re a f***ing douche and I was a fan of you until what I just found out. Literally suck my d*** @LoganPaul you’re a p***y. They do anything for clout. This fool asked ME to go on his podcast and won’t stfu.’

Appearing to challenge Logan to a fight, he later wrote: ‘I’m waiting on him. Mike Tyson will train me in a nano second @MikeTyson & I’ll whoop dat ass. He don’t wanna catch these hands I’m not playing @LoganPaul.’

Finishing his rant, he said: ‘Ain’t nobody asked you to follow me. Lol, ain’t nobody asked to be on your podcast @LoganPaul. I spent two days making that sweater. F*** this!! Waste of my precious beautiful energy.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Ouch.

However, Logan hasn’t addressed the comments publicly, seeming a little more preoccupied with his fight against KSI and the upcoming London press conference.

Recently tweeting about the long-awaited conference, he said: ‘London see u monday. pls don’t stab me.’

Sounds like a reasonable request to be fair.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Aaron Carter aims rant at Logan Paul (who's gearing up for KSI fight) after row with brother Nick.
